page.title: 20HOME LIFE
page.content:
I am Carl Omerod I am 9 years old.I ive at Rainhall Road.This is my family, I have one sister she is Lydia Omerod,and she is 6 years old. My mum is called Caroline,she is 26 years old. My dad works all week,he is far away so he does not come home and I miss him a lot.We go to bed at 9 oclock.I have a bunk bed . My sister sleeps in another bed in another room. We get up at 8.00 and have our breakfast and come to school.
At home I always watch the televison until 5.0 clock because then it is time for tea.We bought a new cooker a month ago because the old cooker blew up, now we have better food. I don't have my tea until 5.00 because my mum does night shift work and she doesnÂ£t get up until 5.00 oclock.
